Text: Since you have hard coded the subs don't you think you should say so, so that people who don't want a file with hard coded subs could see the info and not waste time downloading such files?

If you look in the torrent "files" (above size-info). you will not see the subtitle file. that means the subtitles are in the movie. 

One click to get the info.  

Hard to do? a tip, do not download any torrent That says swesub.  ;)

Anyway, have a good day, mate.  :)
